objects.moduledoc: Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk groups

objects.doc:

`email`: the zendesk email

objects.name: all_organizations
objects.doc: Get all the organizations

objects.name: add_collaborator
objects.doc:
Add a collaborator with an id to the ticket

`id`: the collaborator id

objects.name: add_custom_fields
objects.doc:
Add a custom field in the ticket

`id`: the custom field id

`value`: the custom field value

objects.name: new
objects.doc:
Create a new Ticket map with a comment

`comment`: the ticket comment

objects.name: set_assignee_email
objects.doc:
Set the assignee email

`assignee_email`: the assignee email to add

objects.name: set_assignee_id
objects.doc:
Set the ticket assignee id

`assignee_id`: the ticket assignee id

objects.name: set_collaborator_ids
objects.doc:
Set the ticket collaborator ids

`collaborator_ids`: the ticket collaborator ids

objects.name: set_due_at
objects.doc:
Set the due date for the ticket

`due_at`: the ticket due at date

objects.name: set_external_id
objects.doc:
Set the ticket external id

`external_id`: the ticket external id

objects.name: set_forum_topic_id
objects.doc:
Set the ticket forum topic id

`forum_topic_id`: the ticket forum id

objects.name: set_group_id
objects.doc:
Set the group id for the ticket

`group_id`: the group id to set

objects.name: set_priority
objects.doc:
Set the ticket priority

`priority`: the ticket priority. can be from ["urgent", "high", "normal", "low"]

objects.name: set_problem_id
objects.doc:
Set the the ticket problem id

`problem_id`: the ticket problem id

objects.name: set_requester_id
objects.doc:
Set the ticket requester id

`requester_id`: the requester id

objects.name: set_safe_update
objects.doc:
Set the ticket save update flag

`safe_update`: the safe update flag

objects.name: set_status
objects.doc:
Set the ticket status

`status`: the ticket status. can be from ["open", "pending", "hold", "solved", "closed"]

objects.name: set_subject
objects.doc:
Set the subject ticket

`subject`: the ticket subject

objects.name: set_tags
objects.doc:
Set the tags list to the ticket

`tags`: the ticket list to set

objects.name: set_type
objects.doc:
Set the ticket type

`type`: the ticket type. can be from ["problem", "incident", "question", "task"]

objects.name: set_updated_stamp
objects.doc:
Set ticket updated stamp date

`updated_stamp`: the ticket updated stamp date

objects.name: set_via_followup_source_id
objects.doc:
Set the ticket follow source id

`via_followup_source_id`: the follow up source id

objects.name: all_tickets
objects.doc:
Get All Tickets.

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`ticket`: The ticket object.

`id`: the ticket id to update.

objects.name: autocomplete_problems
objects.doc:
Search the problems using a text query

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`text`: The text to search for

objects.name: create_ticket
objects.doc:
Create a ticket

`ticket`: the ticket to create

objects.name: delete_ticket
objects.doc:
Delete a ticket

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`id`: Thec ticket ID to delete

objects.name: merge_tickets
objects.doc:
Merge a list of tickets to a parent ticket

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`target_id`: The ticket to merge the other tickets into

`ids`: A list of ticket ids to merge

`target_comment`: The comment to add to the target ticket

`source_comment`: The comment to add to the source tickets

objects.name: recent_tickets
objects.doc:
Get the recent tickets

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`id`: The ticket ID to get collaborators for

objects.doc:

Get tickets related to a ticket

Fetch a ticket with ID

objects.doc:
Fetch a group of tickets

`ids`: A list of tickets ids to fetch

objects.name: tickets_with_user
objects.doc:
Get tickets for a ccd user

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`cc`: The cc id of the user to get the ticket for

objects.doc:

`id`: the ticket id to update.
